name: Moodscrape
tagline: Data liberation for your Moodscope scores.
body: ### Use You can run the script from Chrome's console, or it may be more convenient to save as a bookmarklet: Export Moodscope Scores ←Bookmarklet To install, drag the above link to your bookmarks bar. When you run it, make sure you are logged in and your browser is on the chart page. ### About I am a fan of self-metrics and [Moodscope](https://www.moodscope.com/) has been an invaluable tool for measuring, tracking and explaning my mood over time. Unfortunately, as far as I can tell, there is no way to export your score data for all time, though there is a way to export a particular month's mood chart. This script will iterate thru each month of tracking, collect the scores, and export to a csv. ### Requirements Aspects of the script rely on Chrome-specific features and therefore probably won't work in other browsers. ### License and Disclaimer This software is licensed under the MIT License. This project is NOT affiliated with, endorsed, or sponsored by Moodscope.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
